author: rahul
msg: Leave commented line that can be uncommented to switch all tests to use the older parser.

author: rahul
msg: Add <script> parsing to the SCXMLReader, and also improve <data> parsing.
Changed SCXMLReader test names to better match the suite they are in.

author: rahul
msg: Add ECMAScript + E4X support via Rhino (optional feature, binary dependency). Allows leveraging the XML datamodel with ECMAScript in a sane fashion.
Highly modified version of a patch submitted thanks to Ingmar Kliche <ingmar dot kliche at googlemail dot com>.
